title: pkg/html/template/html.go - stale www.w3.org spec links lead to 404 pages
body:
by **dimisec**: 
What does 'go version' print?
go version devel +32b8c26e4414 Mon Mar 17 09:35:04 2014 +1100 darwin/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

1. Visit http://golang.org/src/pkg/html/template/html.go
2. Find www.w3.org links, load them in the browser

What happened?
a 404 "Document Not Found" pages

What should have happened instead?
Links should point to a valid spec page - ex.
http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/syntax.html#tokenization

Please provide any additional information below.
